name: Croco Jump !
description:
Embody Croc and jump through/across over 30 levels within the given time, scoring as many points as possible and avoiding traps and enemies.
Rediscover the appeal of an arcade game on your computer!
You have 3 lives per level. No backing up, only your talent counts.
No advertisements and many updates to come! Ready to take up the challenge?

Commands:
Jump: Space bar
Several jumps: press several times the space bar
Move: left and right arrows
